section.title: Tree model
section.para: Two classes handle the model: TreeV3 is "tree" itself and somewhat a root node, while TreeNodeV3 is any other node, linked by parent and children[] properties. There is a common mixin TreeWithNode.

section.title: Tree parameters
section.para: listeners specifies a list of widgetIds. They will be called AFTER tree itself is initialized, but BEFORE any nodes get added. This allows them to hook on node creation events, mostly useful for markup creation.
